flawed_nl_solution:
The second stack has 7 blocks + 3 blocks = <<7+3=10>>10 blocks.
The third stack has 10 blocks - 6 blocks = <<10-6=9>>9 blocks.
The fourth stack has 9 blocks + 10 blocks = <<9+10=19>>19 blocks.
The fifth stack has 10 blocks x 2 = <<10*2=20>>20 blocks.
In total there are 7 blocks + 10 blocks + 9 blocks + 19 blocks + 20 blocks = <<7+10+9+19+20=65>>65 blocks.
#### 65

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 9. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
